ygData.subject: Re: Chain and Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: That s odd.  I got it last night, and it semed to stack with Binding.  I don t have any hard numbers, but I was fighting 2 of the bandits (Brennon and Truk) in
ygData.messageBody:
That's odd. I got it last night, and it semed to stack with Binding. I
don't have any hard numbers, but I was fighting 2 of the bandits (Brennon
and Truk) in the cave just across from Highpass Keep, and used both during
the fight. At first I used it on Truk, and noticed that Brennon swung more
often, then I switched to fighting Brennon and noticed that Truk was now
swinging at me more. (Neither were equipped with weapons :o/ ) I'll try
it again tonight just to make sure that my eyes weren't deceiving me

-=B=-
The Rathe
23rd
-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, September 10, 1999 1:53 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Chain and Binding


>From: <kim@...>
>
>There was some disagreement over whether the attack slowdown
>from these two stacked so I timed them again. I picked a mob
>(a giant fire beetle) and let it beat on me while I timed how
>long it took for it to make 10 attacks.
>
>Normal: 30.1 sec, 30.2 sec
>Chain: 38.4 sec, 37.9sec
>Binding: 38.2 sec, 38.2 sec
>Chain + Binding: 37.8 sec, 38.2 sec
>
>Slowdown is about 25%, and they most definitely do not stack.
>I'll test it with the enchanter's spells next time I meet one
>of my enchanter friends.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
